addr: 12954 West Washington Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90066
title: Cheese 101 Class
desc: Join us for an evening of cheese, and have all your burning cheese questions answered! Whether you consider yourself a cheese aficionado or amateur, all guests will leave class with new knowledge and be more equipped to approach any cheese counter with confidence. Cheese expert Anikke Fox will guide you through the basics of how cheese is made and aged, the core cheese types, and the fundamentals of buying, storing, tasting and pairing cheese. We will be tasting 6 cheeses, paired with a selected sparkling white and red wine. This informative, fun and oh-so-delicious class is not to be missed!
